title: The Guardian of Threshold
description: Love survives everything… even death. Unfortunately, so does hate.When Mark wants to see his dead mother again… he gets his chance. But, like everything else in life… it comes with a hefty price.While normal sixteen-year-old boys are out chasing girls, Mark is floating outside his own body being chased by a nefarious demon.Death itself can't keep him from trying to see his dead mother again, but when he disturbs Phasma--the Guardian of Threshold, he may have gone too far.Forced into Threshold--the mystical world of the dead--to rescue his clumsy best friend, Mark will not only have to defeat Phasma and his army of Night Dwellers but his own demons if he's going to save his friend, find his mother and survive the night.How far would you go to see a dead relative again?•	"A fantastic and unforgettable journey into the astral realm"The Guardian of Threshold is about 88,000 words or about 346 pages long.
author: A.A. Volts
